title: The big reset: What’s driving the shift from HR tech to work tech? - YourStory
content: The big reset: What’s driving the shift from HR tech to work tech?  YourStory
description: Compensation, benefits, or quarterly appraisals are not motivators for knowledge workers today. So, what’s driving the shift from HR tech to work tech? Catch Gaurav Chaubey, Co-founder of Mesh decoding the future of the workplace in his masterclass on ‘HR tech stack of the future’
